DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Patients center Anesthesiology , OperatingRoom Management Intensive Care Medicine , Gynaecology Paediatrics need peripheral intravenous access Male female patient , adult paediatric Is able give write informed consent , child legal representative Exclusion : Participation another intervention trial study Lacking willingness save hand data within study Accommodation institution due official judicial order The potential insertion site show deformity , phlebitis , infiltration , dermatitis , burn , lesion , nerve injury paresthesia tattoo Study PIV catheter site place old infusion site Patient document know allergy sensitivity medical adhesive product transparent film , adhesive dressing , tape liquid skin protectants Patient require application topical ointment , solution dress addition prep require protocol Patient previous IV catheterrelated phlebitis infiltration hospitalization Patients fear injection Preterm infant
